articles.author: Beth Mole
articles.title: FDA approves first non-opioid pain medicine in more than 20 years - Ars Technica
articles.description: The drug, Journavx (suzetrigine), inhibits an ion channel in peripheral nerves.

articles.title: DeepSeek’s Success Contrasts With China AI Startups’ Struggles - The Information
articles.description: DeepSeek has shaken up Silicon Valley and Wall Street with its stunning advances in artificial intelligence. But its technological success doesn’t mean China’s AI industry has figured out how to make money. The rise of DeepSeek contrasts with the struggles of…
